title: Who Is the Best Player in the Draft? | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 257)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss who they think the best player in the draft is (04:00) before discussing what they think this New Orleans Saints team can be (12:45). Then they play “Would You Rather? Linebacker Edition” (19:43) before talking about their draft crushes (26:45).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
